message.content: This question requires some basic knowledge about the camouflage adaptations of animals. If a deer lives in an area with trunks, it is likely to be a forested area with trees. Option (C) is incorrect because clownfish typically inhabit coral reefs and would not be relevant to a forested area. Option (D) is incorrect because bananas are typically yellow and do not match the color of the trunks.
